talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Confirm)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Please come this way.
I will explain to you the rest.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Where are the Nests?$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You must be baffled.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
{user_nick}, I’m sure you’ve heard about the issues we’ve found.
We are also deeply worried about how we can overcome this ordeal.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it true that I <FONT color=#a82424>can no longer go to Nests</FONT> from here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
That’s right. There were early signs but no one could predict something like this would happen.
This is something that has never happened before.
This is the worst thing that has occurred since the Garden of Time and Space was first created……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I heard that too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Sadly you can’t, at least for now.
Velskud is trying his best to find a way to restore the Garden but it looks difficult.
We need to check if the Nests are creating any more catastrophe first.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I bet it’s going to be a long journey.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Since you already know about it, that would save us much time.
To respond quickly to any changes in the Nests, the Order has deployed Priestesses to various places.
{user_nick}, your task is to help them and check if there are signs of bigger problems in the Nests.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
First, please head over to Anu Arendel.
That’s where the Monolith’s entrance is so it worries me the most.
Please make sure it’s the first place you visit. You can find Pretzel there.

$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
You need to hear the explanations from Priestess Madeleine first.
Why don’t you finish your conversation with her before coming back?

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I hope you didn’t forget that Pretzel is now stationed in Anu Arendel.
She must be waiting for you now, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Nice to meet you too, Priestess. How is the <FONT color=#a82424>Nest’s status</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
I’ve been waiting for you. So the hero Madeleine told me about was you, {user_nick}.
Nice to meet you.
I’m Priestess of Darkness Pretzel.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We shouldn’t let there be any more problems with the Nests…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
The Nest still looks fine from the outside.
But I can’t go inside to check it.
That would be your job from now, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’ll go and check if there are any bigger issues with the Nests!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
The Nests that have appeared here again are Volcano Nest, Mist Nest, Guardian Nest, and Red Dragon Nest.
The people of Anu Arendel probably have never imagined that the Nests that were being separately managed in the Garden of Time and Space would reappear like this.
Although they are keeping quiet about this matter, fear is in the air.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
I will count on you then.
May the Goddess bless you with her protection.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
There must be something you were asked to do by another Priestess.
We are counting on you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Accept)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
Have you not completed what I asked you to do yet?
Please go and check the Nests.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I hope you didn’t forget about the Priestess who is stationed in Anu Arendel.
She must be waiting for you now, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There were no major problems to worry about.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
Welcome back. How was the Nest?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It was not much different from when it was at the Garden of Time and Space. I didn’t find anything abnormal either.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
Can you tell me more about that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Labyrinth is still…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
Is that so? Phew, what a relief.
How about the Labyrinth phenomenon?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That reminds me of Velskud saying that a catastrophe can’t be reverted once it happens.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
What a pity.
I had a tiny hope that since the Nests returned to their original places, maybe they were restored to their states before the Labyrinth occurred.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Not at all. But where are the other Nests?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
This is an ordeal we must overcome.
{user_nick}, I hope I didn’t ruin your mood.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>They are so scattered now. The Order must be having a hard time too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
The other Nests can be found in Hermalte Port, Calderock Village, and Riverwort Wharf.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, I don’t have to check those places?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
Other Priestesses like me were deployed there so you will be informed immediately when an anomaly is detected.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I see. I wish you all the best.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
It looks like other adventurers helped us with them.
No major problems were found in those places either. However, that doesn’t mean we can stop keeping a close watch on them.

$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
I won’t keep my eyes off the Nest.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. I’m glad the situation isn’t worse.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
You’re back. I heard that fortunately the Nests are fine.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But he’ll probably be back soon.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
You’re right, {user_nick}.
Everyone’s at a loss due to what happened.
And Velskud is not around either……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why are you worried about that now? Is something wrong?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
But...
I’m worried something might have happened to Velskud.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? The Monolith? Please tell me what happened.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
We’ve lost contact with Velskud for too long.
He went to check the Monolith. But…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then the reason why Velskud left in such a hurry was because…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
We discovered a few incidents before you came back.
I’m sure you already know that the Nests are no longer connected here now.
But we had another problem and that was the Monolith.
Velskud detected an intrusion in the Monolith and immediately hurried there to check on it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Maybe the investigation is just taking longer than expected.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Yes. It was because of the Monolith.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’ll go and take a look if you’re so worried.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
If that’s the case, he must have informed us by now. I have a bad feeling about this.
{user_nick}, can you go and check if Velskud is all right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Thank you. Please tell me when you’re ready to enter the Monolith.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Confirm)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I hope Velskud is all right.

journal.title: Location
journal.contents:
Talk to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine and listen to her explanations.

Garden of Time and Space - Priestess of Darkness Madeleine
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine.

journal.title: Watching the Entrance
journal.contents:
Find Priestess of Darkness Pretzel who is stationed at Anu Arendel.

Anu Arendel - Priestess of Darkness Pretzel
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Pretzel
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Pretzel at Anu Arendel.

journal.title: To the Nest 1
journal.contents:
Check the Nest in Anu Arendel among all the Nests that were scattered.

Anu Arendel - Volcano Nest
Anu Arendel - Mist Nest
Anu Arendel - Guardian Nest
Anu Arendel - Red Dragon Nest

journal.title: To the Nest 2
journal.contents:
Tell Priestess of Darkness Pretzel about the situation in the Nest that you have investigated.

Anu Arendel - Priestess of Darkness Pretzel
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Pretzel
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Pretzel at Anu Arendel.

journal.title: Bright Side
journal.contents:
Return to Garden of Time and Space and report to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine.

Garden of Time and Space - Priestess of Darkness Madeleine
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Garden of Time and Space and talk to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine.
